articles.description: HSBC bank closures are on the way. The bank has released a full list of 82 branches to close. Is your branch on this list?
articles.content:
HSBC is closing 82 branches this year, between the dates of April and September.
After the move, there will be 511 branches left in the UK.
HSBC branches closing
Closing April 23, 2021
Closing Ma… [+1119 chars]
